message.name: ERR_FV_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_REMOTE_SYSTEM_LINK_MANDATORY_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT
message.locale: The related Life Event Context field must be set.

message.name: ERR_FV_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_REMOTE_SYSTEM_LINK_MANDATORY_REMOTE_SYSTEM
message.locale: The related Remote System field must be set.

message.name: ERR_XRV_LIFE_EVENT_CONTEXT_REMOTE_SYS_PAIR_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: Remote System '%1s' has already been added to this life event. A remote system cannot be added more than once to a life event.
